scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures in a landscape setting with architectural elements. In the foreground, a bearded man with a halo rides a donkey, holding a book and gesturing with his right hand. He is accompanied by several other haloed figures. To the right, a man in a yellow tunic stands next to a pink cloth draped over a structure. Behind him, two figures peer out from an opening in a blue, turreted building. In the background, two figures are positioned in trees, gathering fruit or branches. The overall scene is set against a vibrant red, patterned backdrop.
